Text: Man, this show has really gone down hill lately...I would gladly wait an entire year for only 6 episodes during the first three seasons...now, idk. Just when people start warming up to Curtis, they kill him off and Rudy can't carry the entire show forever before they somehow screw him up and we're sick of him too! Bleh, I think the season will be the last, and if not, it should be.
I know what you mean Xplosiv0. Killing off the whole main cast in the span of three seasons is just not a good idea.
Do you know of anyone over on the other side of the pond planning to post Restless part one from 12-7-2012?
Excellent job "eztv" Thank you! you're the Best, Fast Download, very much  Appreciate Small files with Great Qualities, Prefect keep eem coming :)

Forgot to thank ettv for the upload. After watching the episode, I am all but confident that this should be the final series. It's like they're depending on obscene shock value to hook the audience. How about explaining the origins of the storm? Or better yet, stop with the community service, it's no longer believable that they all coincidentally have powers and are at the same community center. How about covering the public's reaction to the storm? Nope, they'll just keep giving us more of the same which is not nearly as good as it used to be. Then again, as someone who pirated every episode so far, I guess I'm not the target audience.
